entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:11 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 01:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
